document.full_text: paying tribute to his piano-playing idol leon russell, elton john opened the tribeca film festival on wednesday with a free outdoor performance and film premiere about the making of his album, "the union."
document.title: elton john opens tribeca festival with "the union"
lines_and_colors: paying tribute to his piano-playing idol leon russell, elton john opened the tribeca film festival on wednesday with a free outdoor performance and film premiere about the making of his album, "the union."
